entities.name: room
entities.description: The room is described as dank and dark with peeling walls. It has a blank stretch of canvas in an ornate picture frame.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to keep his voice casual while asking Ron and Hermione about Dumbledore.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person of authority who has been keeping Harry in the dark. He is busy and only seen twice since they came here.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is trying to tell him what was going on but couldn't because Dumbledore was too busy.

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another friend of Harry's who is also trying to tell him about Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Harry is kept in the dark by Dumbledore, as he doesn't know what's going on.
Ron and Hermione tried to tell Harry about Dumbledore but couldn't because Dumbledore was too busy.
Harry asked Ron why Dumbledore kept him in the dark.
